attributes.action: Announce on national television that he has , quote '' lost the game''. In doing so the prime minister will end said silly game once and for all, and everyone can just get on with their lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: according to the rules of 'the game', said game can only be won should a national political figurehead (IE: the Prime Minister) announce publicly on national television that he has , quote : 'Lost the Game' . Should said prime minister achieve this goal, the game will be won , hence it shall cease to exist. Therefore we can all get on with our lives no longer pestered by this ridiculous game once and for all. We the undersigned petition the prime minister to do a great public service in making this public announcement, despite the apparent silliness of him doing so.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
